short_summary: Request for Proposal: Dell Network Hardware
description: Dell Network Hardware SSC Network switches- Amendment 000
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Network Switches for the Shared Services Canada Data Network

## Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: BPM017678/21163
* **Reference Number**: SSC-22-00021163:T
* **Publication Date**: December 15, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 28, 2022 at 11:00 am

## Project Description
Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites bids for the procurement of Network Switches as part of our Data Network upgrade. All vendors are invited to submit their proposals.

## Requirements

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: None

## Project Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Contracting Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 0B6, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Dimeji Temidire
* **Email**: dimeji.temidire@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 613-618-2048
* **Fax**: 999-999-9999

## Attachments
The tender documents and specifications can be downloaded from the following URLs:
* [English Documents](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/44F11030-D66F-4A20-BAD4-614988BF07A5)
* [French Documents](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/79443F70-14A6-4FB5-8E40-70B0434EDDA9) 
* [Supporting Documents](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/9813D8BF-2766-4314-A21B-274AA592C3B3)

## Tender Status
The tender notice is now expired.
